attributes.action: Allow Jamaican Nationals To Visit, Study & Work In The UK without a Visa.
attributes.additional_details: Jamaica nationals, ancestors and descendants has played a huge role in the development of the UK. As a former common wealth colony, I believe it is only fair that the citizens of Jamaican get the chance to visit and work in the UK without requiring a visa, seeing as how much impact they have had on the establishment UK and the outstanding reparations the UK have yet to provide for Jamaica as a country as a result of colonisation.
attributes.background:
Allow Jamaican nationals to travel to the UK and work without a Visa. 

As a descent of a Jamaican mother whom migrated to the UK when she was 23 years old, in 1989 for a better life, the age I am today.I have a passion for wanting the same opportunity to be available for other Jamaican nationals.
